alert.note: Alert for Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Northwest Monroe; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:03PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN RHEA...SOUTHWESTERN LOUDON...NORTHEASTERN MEIGS...NORTHEASTERN MCMINN AND SOUTHWESTERN ROANE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring City, or 11 miles north of Decatur, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Loudon, Spring City, Niota, Paint Rock, Peakland, Eagle Furnace, Murray Store, Grandview, and Piney Falls State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Northwest Monroe; Rhea; Roane
